title: "Galactic Portal"
content:
ðŸš€ Welcome to Galactic Portal! ðŸŒŒ

Our website is your gateway to the cosmos. Explore the vast expanse of space and discover new worlds, galaxies, and civilizations. With our cutting-edge technology, you can travel through wormholes and experience the thrill of interstellar travel.

At Galactic Portal, we are dedicated to providing you with the most immersive space exploration experience possible. Our team of expert astronomers and astrophysicists have curated a collection of the most stunning images from across the universe, including breathtaking nebulae, distant planets, and awe-inspiring black holes.

Whether you're an amateur stargazer or a seasoned astronaut, Galactic Portal has something for everyone. Join our community of space enthusiasts and embark on a journey that will take you to the furthest reaches of the cosmos.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a spaceship approaching a wormhole, with bright colors and distorted shapes."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
